sections.heading: Introduction
content: Welcome to Food Nutrient Profiles. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle your personal information when you use our application (hereafter referred to as "the App").

The App is a nutrition database that displays food composition information from published scientific sources. The App does not collect, store, or transmit any personal data. All functionality operates entirely on your device without any external communication or data collection.
We are committed to safeguarding your privacy. By using the App, you agree to the terms outlined in this Privacy Policy.

sections.heading: Collection of Personal Data
content: The App does not collect any personal data.
There is:
<ul class="list-disc list-outside mb-4 space-y-1 pl-5">
• No account system
• No analytics
• No internet communication
• No logging of user activity
• No background data collection

All features work locally on your device. Any settings or preferences you configure (such as daily reference values, rating thresholds, age, sex, diet preferences, and other customisation options) are stored only on your device using the operating system's standard storage mechanisms (such as UserDefaults on iOS).

The App displays food composition data from published scientific sources and food composition databases. This data is included within the App and does not require any network connection or data transmission to access.

sections.heading: Use of Personal Data
content: Since no data is collected, no personal data is used, processed, or analysed in any form.

sections.heading: Sharing of Personal Data
content: Your data is never shared with third parties, advertisers, analytics providers, or any external services. The App does not communicate externally.

sections.heading: Third-Party Services
content: The App does not integrate with or utilise any third-party services that would collect, process, or store your personal data.

The App includes food composition data from various published scientific sources and food composition databases. This data is embedded within the App and accessed locallyâ€”no data is transmitted to or from any third party.

sections.heading: Cookies and Other Technologies
content: The App does not use cookies, tracking pixels, or similar technologies to collect personal data.
Any settings or preferences are stored locally on your device to enhance usability, but these do not involve tracking or transmitting personal information.

sections.heading: International Data Transfers
content: The App does not transmit any data. Therefore, no data crosses international borders or is stored on any remote server.

sections.heading: Data Retention & Storage
content: Since the App does not collect any personal data, there is no personal data to retain or store.
Any settings or preferences you configure are stored locally on your device and remain under your control. You can delete the App at any time, which will remove all locally stored data.

sections.heading: Protection of Personal Data
content: As no personal data is collected or stored, there is no risk of external data breaches related to this App.
All user settings are stored securely in the device's local storage system (such as Apple's UserDefaults system on iOS), local to your device.

sections.heading: Your Privacy Rights & Choices
content: You retain full control of the data on your device. No user information is stored elsewhere or accessed by the developer.

Since the App does not collect any personal data, there is no personal data to access, correct, or delete beyond what is stored locally on your device, which you can manage through your device settings or by deleting the App.

sections.heading: Children & Privacy
content: The App is not specifically designed for use by children, and it is intended for general audiences. However, because the App does not collect or process any personal data, its use by children does not pose any privacy risk.

sections.heading: Changes to This Policy
content: This Privacy Policy may be updated in future to reflect changes in functionality or to meet legal requirements.
Any updates will be clearly posted on this page. You are encouraged to review the policy periodically to stay informed. We will endeavour to notify users of any significant changes where appropriate.
Continued use of the App after changes have been made constitutes your acceptance of the updated policy.

sections.heading: Contact Us
content: If you have questions about this policy or your data, please contact:
Email: hello@cumuluscoding.com
